name: Pokeball
description: The classic. Always there when you need it.

name: Greatball
description: Increased catch rates. Affordable and dependable.

name: Ultraball
description: The best catch rates. Premium performance and quality.

name: Masterball
description: Guaranteed catch. It doesn't get any better than this.

name: Super Potion
description: Keep your pokemon in fighting shape. Instant results.

name: Hyper Potion
description: The ultimate situation saver. Keep yourself in the match.

name: Revive
description: For those moments when you thought the fight was already over.

name: Incense
description: Dont spend your time pacing in tall grass. Bring the Pokemon to you.
